TextView.android:text: Welcome to Urgent! This task management app is designed to help you breakdown your tasks into four categories: important and urgent, important and not urgent, unimportant and urgent, and unimportant and not urgent, rather than based on time. The purpose of basing tasks off of importance rather than time is based off of a quote from Eisenhower "I have two kinds of problems, the urgent and the important. The urgent are not important, and the important are never urgent." It is my hope that this app will help you manage your time more effectively.
